entries.meaning: Linnaeus's two-toed sloth, Choloepus didactylus, a two-toed sloth native to South America.
examples: The unau, or two-toed sloth, has no tail, and only two nails on the fore feet. The ai, or three-toed sloth, has a short tail, and three nails on every foot. The nose of the unau, is likewise much longer, the forehead higher, and the ears longer than those of the ai.
